I've seen the life and death of this game. extremely, competitive first person shooter with an interesting twist on strategy and teamwork. the professional community was a major drive in the games popularity and playerbase. over the years i've owned this game the overall quality of gameplay and the "counterstrike" feel has degraded into a shitty attempt to mimic battle-royale (absolute worst BR ever created) while still trying maintain the base functions of what used to CS:GO. If i were to write this review 4 years ago before the shitshow of updates i would 100% recommend this game to other players, but quite frankly it is not the same game. 

Oh and i forgot to mention cheaters. they have all this "prime" and "trust factor" bullshit to deter and try to keep cheaters away from competitive matchmaking primarily but also other gamemodes of course, you can be trust factor 20 million and you will most likely still be matched with a cheater.

Easy to learn, hard to master. Toxic community. No option to set your preferred language for matches which means you can get 4 Russian-speaking players in your team. If you like competitive shooters this is a must play title. 6/10 normally but since mute button exists I rate this game 10/10.
